ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] Darkwood Staff
ygData.msgSnippet: Alright i know this quest. )  Romar Sunto will  give you a darkwook staff, also known as the Staff of Ro, which is useable by all classes, if you bring him a
ygData.messageBody:
Alright i know this quest. ) Romar Sunto will give you a darkwook staff,
also known as the Staff of Ro, which is useable by all classes, if you bring
him a Lambent Stone from a Hill Giant, a Sand Giant or a Griffin. It is in
the Temple of Solusek Ro. It is a 1hb dmg 5 dly 28? and magic. Great for
newbies to get and easy, lambent stones can be bought for bout 20-30p.

Falorn
Level 30 warrior
